mapper.select: select sasp.*,su.actual_name as create_name,so.name as organization_name,sat.name as team_name from sys_attendance_scheduling_plan as sasp,sys_user as su, sys_attendance_team as sat,sys_organization as so where sasp.create_id = su.id and sasp.team_id = sat.id and sat.organization_id = so.id and sasp.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_attendance_scheduling_plan( name, team_id, status, create_id, create_date )values ( #{name}, #{teamId}, #{status}, #{createId}, #{createDate} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

insert into sys_attendance_scheduling_plan_detail( attendance_scheduling_plan_id, working_days, first_time_start, first_time_end, second_time_start, second_time_end )values ( #{attendanceSchedulingPlanId}, #{workingDays}, #{firstTimeStart}, #{firstTimeEnd}, #{secondTimeStart}, #{secondTimeEnd} )
mapper.select: select saspe.* from sys_attendance_scheduling_plan_exception as saspe,sys_attendance_scheduling_plan as sasp,sys_attendance_team as sat where saspe.attendance_scheduling_plan_id = sasp.id and sasp.team_id = sat.id and sasp.status = 1 and TO_DAYS(now()) = TO_DAYS(saspe.date_range) and FIND_IN_SET(#{id},sat.team_members)

select sacpd.* from sys_attendance_scheduling_plan_detail as sacpd,sys_attendance_scheduling_plan as sasp,sys_attendance_team as sat where sacpd.attendance_scheduling_plan_id = sasp.id and sasp.team_id = sat.id and sasp.status = 1 and sacpd.working_days = WEEKDAY(now()) and FIND_IN_SET(#{id},sat.team_members)
